findings.title: Mobile screen Largest Contentful paint takes more than a minute
findings.description: The mobile screen's largest contentful paint takes longer than expected, exceeding 1 minute when it should be within 2-3 seconds.

findings.title: Mobile screen Total Blocked time is 44 seconds
findings.description: The mobile screen total blocked time exceeds the recommended limit of 2-3 seconds, which can negatively impact user experience.

findings.title: Unused Javascript and CSS need to be removed
findings.description: Removing unused JavaScript and CSS files can improve website performance and reduce potential security risks.

findings.title: Images and static assets should be optimized
findings.description: Optimizing images and static assets can improve website performance by reducing load times.

findings.title: Enormous network payloads should be avoided
findings.description: Avoiding enormous network payloads to prevent potential performance and security issues.

findings.title: Elements are overlapping with each other
findings.description: Overlapping elements can cause layout issues and affect user experience.

findings.title: Scrolling is not working properly
findings.description: The website's scrolling functionality does not work as intended.
